scoringPlays.text: Keith Mixon 44 Yd pass from Nick Fitzgerald (Westin Graves Kick)
Hunter Marshall 1 Yd pass from Taysom Hill (Rhett Almond Kick)
Nick Fitzgerald 1 Yd Run (Westin Graves Kick)
Moroni Laulu-Pututau 15 Yd pass from Taysom Hill (Andrew Mikkelsen Kick)
Nick Fitzgerald 2 Yd Run (Westin Graves Kick)
Taysom Hill 1 Yd Run (Andrew Mikkelsen Kick)
Tanner Balderree 25 Yd pass from Taysom Hill (Rhett Almond Kick)

videos.description: Nick Fitzgerald can't find any room to run, so instead changes his mind and throws it out at the last second to Keith Mixon who goes 44 yards down the sideline to put Mississippi State in front of BYU 7-0.
videos.headline: Mississippi State improvises for a wild 44-yard TD

videos.description: BYU caps a 15-play drive by going for it on fourth down from the one with a play-action pass leaving Hunter Marshall wide open for the touchdown, bringing the Cougars back level with Mississippi State.
videos.headline: BYU's fourth down gamble pays off with touchdown

videos.description: Nick Fitzgerald pass intercepted Micah Hannemann return for no gain to the BYU 32
videos.headline: N. Fitzgerald pass intercepted by M. Hannemann

videos.description: Mississippi State regains the lead after capping off a 14-play drive with Nick Fitzgerald going right up the middle to the end zone.
videos.headline: Mississippi State finishes long drive with one-yard plunge

videos.description: Taysom Hill pass intercepted Mark McLaurin return for 30 yds to the 50 yard line
videos.headline: T. Hill pass intercepted by M. McLaurin

videos.description: Facing third and goal from the 15, Taysom Hill throws a dart to a diving Moroni Laulu-Pututau to make the spectacular grab that ties the score for BYU at 14-14.
videos.headline: Laulu-Pututau lays out for the diving BYU TD grab

videos.description: Nick Fitzgerald pass intercepted Kai Nacua return for 10 yds to the BYU 25
videos.headline: N. Fitzgerald pass intercepted by K. Nacua

videos.description: Taysom Hill pass complete to Moroni Laulu-Pututau for 19 yds to the BYU 43 for a 1ST down
videos.headline: Laulu-Pututau makes one handed grab

videos.description: On the opening possession of overtime, Nick Fitzgerald scrambles out of the pocket and with the goal line in sight he jumps over a defender and flips into the end zone for the Mississippi State touchdown.
videos.headline: Fitzgerald leaps over defender for overtime TD

videos.description: Taysom Hill run for 1 yd for a TD
videos.headline: T. Hill run for 1 yd for a TD

videos.description: Taysom Hill pass complete to Tanner Balderree for 25 yds for a TD
videos.headline: T. Hill pass to T. Balderree for 25 yds for a TD

videos.description: With Mississippi State needing to score a touchdown, Nick Fitzgerald rolls out and throws to the end zone but his pass can't be hauled in giving BYU the dramatic 28-21 double overtime win.
videos.headline: BYU holds off Mississippi State's last gasp OT chance
